herocontent: Passionate Front-End Developer with a knack for creating responsive web applications. I sharpen my skills in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.Motivated to learn and grow in a collaborative and dynamic environment, providing creative and effectiv solutions to web development challenges.
aboutText: I am a professional with over 10 years of experience in technical support and field engineering, specializing in hardware/software diagnosis and repair, mobile operating system installation, on-site and remote customer service, and report management using tools such as SAP and CRM.In recent years, I have developed a strong passion for web development, which led me to train as a Junior Front-End Developer, gaining experience in technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind. I have created personal projects that you can find in my portfolio, where I apply best practices, responsive design, and modern programming logic.
